content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    Category, Count(*) as ProductCount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalake2rnze4g.dfs.core.windows.net/files/product_date/product.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY Category;
